name: Burger Kit
description: Our burgers are prepared with prime cuts and steak trimmings, salt & pepper, so that you can really taste that BBQ Baddies flavour.

name: Kabab Kit
description: Our pre-marinated Kabab Kits can be cooked in any domestic grill! Yum!

name: Sasuage Kits
description: This charcuterie is all made in-house by Cochon Butcher, a hybrid New Orleans. Best house-made charcuterie and creative sandwiches.

name: Chicken Wings
description: A marinade wing based on Turkish hot pepper paste infuses them with roasted-chile flavor.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Our chicken nuggets are made with the finest quality chicken, and are prepared with a special sauce that is made with the finest quality of spices.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Our BBQ ribs are made with the finest quality of pork meat, and are prepared with a special sauce that is made with the finest quality of spices.

name: BBQ Beans
description: Our BBQ beans are made with the finest quality of beans, and are prepared with a special sauce that is made with the finest quality of spices.

name: BBQ Sauce
description: Our BBQ sauce is made with the finest quality of spices, and is prepared with a special sauce that is made with the finest quality of spices.

name: Mashed Potatoes
description: Our mashed potatoes are made with the finest quality of potatoes, and are prepared with a special sauce that is made with the finest quality of spices.
